name: ZKX
description: ZKX is an omnichain perpetual exchange on Starknet, committed to building DeFi solutions for all. The exchange strives to combine the performance of a CEX with the security of a DEX; ZKX achieves this through a decentralized order book powered by the ZKX Appchain and a user-centric self-custodial ZKX Account. At the core of ZKX's protocol design is built-in security and gamification, which has been audited by Nethermind Security twice.
